example.parse: (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC تكلفة) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN العملية))) (PP-MNR (PREP ك) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (NP-SBJ (NP (PRON_3MS هو)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-2))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM مذكور))))) (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تبلغ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN_NUM 14) (NP (NOUN_NUM+CASE_DEF_ACC الف) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN دولار) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_GEN اميركي))))
